author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Panchayat-level Sports Meets are to be held in all 860 panchayats in Tiruvannamalai district starting from January 28.

Every panchayat is allotted Rs. 20,000 to conduct this sports meet. District Collector A. Gnanasekaran has released cheques to the Block Development Officers (BDOs) of all the blocks in the district.

The sport meets would begin on January 28 and would be over in all panchayats by February 20.
title: Sports meet from Jan.28
